findings.title: The value of ThreePoolInfo may be overridden
findings.description: When creating a 3pool, if t0 and t1 are consistent with the created pool, it will cause the value of ThreePoolInfo to be rewritten, and the previously created pool information will be overwritten.

findings.title: Reentrancy risk
findings.description: Making an external call before burning the LP token in the _remove_liquidity_ function may lead to known read-only reentrancy risk in special cases.

findings.title: Redundant code
findings.description: This function can only be called by the owner, and only updates the value of threePoolInfo, which is not necessary.
